title: Welcome to DataStax Enterprise Recipes
description:
Full tutorial + resources: http://bit.ly/tutorials-recipes | We have lots of helpful videos on DataStax Academy. Some cover big topics, like Apache Cassandra data modeling and some answer single questions like how do I install DataStax Enterprise. If our big course-long topics are "full course meals," these single question, DataStax Enterprise Recipes are "quick snacks."

ABOUT DATASTAX ENTERPRISE 5
DataStax Enterprise 5.0, the database platform for cloud applications, includes Apache Cassandra 3.x with materialized views, tiered storage and advanced replication. Introduced in 5.0 is DataStax Enterprise Graph, the first graph database fast enough to power customer-facing applications, scale to massive datasets and integrate advanced tools to power deep analytical queries.

Learn more at http://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-enterprise and https://academy.datastax.com/resources/whats-new-datastax-enterprise-50

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastax?sub_confirmation=1 
Site: http://datastax.com 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/datastax 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastax 
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/datastax
http://feeds.feedburner.com/datastax 
https://github.com/datastax 

ABOUT DATASTAX ACADEMY
On the DataStax Academy YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, webinars and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on DataStax EnterpriseÂ©.  Create an account on https://academy.datastax.com to watch our free online courses, tutorials, and more.

transcript.text: hey welcome to data stacks Academy I'm Tim Bergling we've got a lot of helpful videos here in the Academy and there are two things we're trying to do with them sometimes we've got a big topic we want to teach you one step at a time introducing you to something big like spark on data stacks enterprise or Cassandra operations but there are also little topics things where you're trying to answer just one question where we can help I guess what I'm trying to say is sometimes you want a full course meal and sometimes just a quick snack our recipe videos are all about answering the questions you've told us you have about how to use the technology [Music] there are links in the description below to all of the other recipe videos whether you're trying to run your first spark job ever or just trying to figure out how to download install and configure data stacks enterprise you could probably find what you need or if you want a more guided tour click here for the first one [Music] you really should have clicked by now [Music]
